question: List polyubiquitin binding proteins involved in NF-kappaB signaling.
ideal_answer:
NEMO
A20
ABIN-1
ABIN-2
optineurin
p62

snippets.text: he discovery that NEMO is a polyubiquitin-binding protein and that the IKK complex is modulated by other protein kinases that are themselves controlled by polyubiquitin chains has provided a deeper molecular understanding of the non-degradative roles of ubiquitylation
Essential roles of K63-linked polyubiquitin-binding proteins TAB2 and TAB3 in B cell activation via MAPKs.

Novel polyubiquitin binders AWP1, CALCOCO2, N4BP1, RIO3, TEX27, TTC3, UBFD1 and ZNF313 were identified using this approach, while known NF-kappaB regulators including NEMO, A20, ABIN-1, ABIN-2, optineurin and p62 were also identified

exact_answer: NEMO, A20, ABIN-1, ABIN-2, optineurin, p62
